name: ChartTitle
description: Represents a chart title object of a chart.

properties.name: format
properties.description: Represents the formatting of a chart title, which includes fill and font formatting.

properties.name: overlay
properties.description: Boolean value representing if the chart title will overlay the chart or not.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Represents the title text of a chart.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: A boolean value the represents the visibility of a chart title object.

properties.name: horizontalAlignment
properties.description: Represents the horizontal alignment for the specified objec

properties.name: top
properties.description: Represents the distance, in points, from the top edge of chart title to the top of chart area. Null if chart title's not visible.

properties.name: left
properties.description: Represents the distance, in points, from the left edge of chart title to the left edge of chart area. Null if chart title's not visible.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Returns the width, in points, of the chart title. Read-only. Null if chart title's not visible.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Returns the height, in points, of the chart title. Read-only. Null if chart title's not visible.

properties.name: verticalAlignment
properties.description: Represents the vertical alignment of chart title.

methods.name: getSubstring
methods.description: Get the characters of a chart title. Line break '\n' also counts one charater.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start index of the sub string

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The length of the sub string

methods.name: setFormula
methods.description: Sets a string value that represents the formula of chart title using A1-style notation.
